rooms.description: Modern minimalist design with polished concrete flooring and minimalistic decor.
Spacious open-plan living room featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light.
Modular dining space with minimalist decor and integrated lighting.
Modern kitchen with state-of-the-art appliances, minimalist cabinetry and a central island.
Primary bedroom with ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows. Includes built-in wardrobe and en-suite bathroom.
Modern ensuite bathroom for Bedroom 1 with minimalist fixtures.
Secondary bedroom featuring floor-to-ceiling windows and integrated closet space.
Shared bathroom for Bedroom 2 with minimalist design.
Dedicated library space featuring floor-to-ceiling windows and built-in bookcases following Vastu principles for knowledge flow.

openings.description: Two-car garage integrated with the villa ensuring easy access and storage solutions.
Minimalist exterior door for secure entry.
